item.title: Macron and Putin Discuss Iran and Ukraine in Rare Call
item.description: It was the two leaders’ first call since 2022, and the Russian president’s first with any major European leader since last year.

item.title: Keir Starmer Endures Rebellion in Parliament Over Welfare Cuts

item.title: Senate Version of Trump’s Policy Bill Ends Many Clean Energy Credits
item.description: By ending tax credits for wind and solar power, Senate Republicans may have jeopardized billions in investments in their own districts.

item.title: Israelis Set a Palestinian Village Ablaze in West Bank Attack
